def.threejs.three

Class Face3

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.Face3
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Face4

    public class Face3
extends def.js.Object
    Triangle face. # Example var normal = new THREE.Vector3( 0, 1, 0 ); var color = new THREE.Color( 0xffaa00 ); var face = new THREE.Face3( 0, 1, 2, normal, color, 0 );
